Decentralize bookmark APP, you can save web content like pocket but onIPFS, and you can also category different content with folders or add tags.

After installing Kontext.app,
In Twitter, you can see bookmark icon below each tweet, just click it, magic! it is saved on blockchain;
For other website, all what you do is click the extension logo.
